resources.string: One of the fastest growing Digital Agency

This represents an almost 30% year-over-year growth. Digital Web Development and App Development as well as it includes Promotional videography, poster creation is one of the fastest growing advertising segments expected to reach 8.8% of all ads by 2022. This is growth rate of 13% compare to traditional TV ad spending and traditional web development that is only expected to grow with 0.4%.
